text: it's a of course a very vexing issue

however that word is

God's brain in which we were I think
able to suggest if not demonstrate that
religion is really made by the brain
it's a secretion of the brain and this
gets us away from the issue of whether

they're absolutely correct and everyone

so we're not dealing here with a casual

this

also

uh matter of
Serotonin he discovered that serotonin

status and that when animals had high
